trans-unit.source: Standard TimeSpan format strings
trans-unit.target: 标准 TimeSpan 格式字符串

trans-unit.source: Standard TimeSpan format strings
trans-unit.target: 标准 TimeSpan 格式字符串

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
Standard TimeSpan format strings
trans-unit.target: 标准 TimeSpan 格式字符串

trans-unit.source: A standard [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format string uses a single format specifier to define the text representation of a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value that results from a formatting operation.
trans-unit.target: 标准 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式字符串使用单个格式说明符来定义格式化操作生成的 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值的文本表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Any format string that contains more than one character, including white space, is interpreted as a custom [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format string.
trans-unit.target: 任何包含一个以上字符（包括空格）的格式字符串都被解释为自定义 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](custom-timespan.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义 TimeSpan 格式字符串](custom-timespan.md)。

trans-unit.source: The string representations of [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) values are produced by calls to the overloads of the [TimeSpan.ToString](xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString) method, as well as by methods that support composite formatting, such as [String.Format](xref:System.String.Format(System.IFormatProvider,System.String,System.Object)).
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 [TimeSpan.ToString](xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString) 方法的重载以及通过支持复合格式设置的方法（如 [String.Format](xref:System.String.Format(System.IFormatProvider,System.String,System.Object))）产生 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Formatting Types](formatting-types.md) and [Composite Formatting](composite-format.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见[格式设置类型](formatting-types.md)和[复合格式设置](composite-format.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of standard format strings in formatting operations
trans-unit.target: 以下示例演示了标准格式字符串在格式化操作中的用法

trans-unit.source: Standard [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format strings are also used by the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) and [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) methods to define the required format of input strings for parsing operations.
trans-unit.target: 标准 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式字符串也由 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 和 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法用于定义分析操作所需的输入字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: (Parsing converts the string representation of a value to that value.) The following example illustrates the use of standard format strings in parsing operations.
trans-unit.target: （分析将值的字符串表示形式转换成该值。）以下示例演示了标准格式字符串在分析操作中的用法。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the standard time interval format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了标准时间间隔格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: Format specifier
Name
Description
Examples
Constant (invariant) format
This specifier is not culture-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此说明符不区分区域性。

trans-unit.source: It takes the form [-][d’.’]hh’:’mm’:’ss[‘.’fffffff].
(The "t" and "T" format strings produce the same results.)
trans-unit.target: （“t”格式与“T”格式字符串产生的结果相同。）

trans-unit.source: General short format
This specifier outputs only what is needed.
trans-unit.target: 该说明符仅输出需要的内容。

trans-unit.source: It is culture-sensitive and takes the form [-][d’:’]h’:’mm’:’ss[.FFFFFFF].
trans-unit.target: 它区分区域性并采用 [-][d’:’]h’:’mm’:’ss[.FFFFFFF] 格式。

trans-unit.source: General long format
This specifier always outputs days and seven fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: 此说明符始终输出天数和七个小数位。

trans-unit.source: It is culture-sensitive and takes the form [-]d’:’hh’:’mm’:’ss.fffffff.
trans-unit.target: 它区分区域性并采用 [-]d’:’hh’:’mm’:’ss.fffffff 格式。

trans-unit.source: The Constant ("c") Format Specifier
The "c" format specifier returns the string representation of a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value in the following form:
trans-unit.target: “c”格式说明符返回的 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值的字符串表示形式具有以下形式：

trans-unit.source: [-][_d_.]_hh_:_mm_:_ss_[._fffffff_]
Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The period (.) and colon (:) are literal symbols.
trans-unit.target: 句点 (.) 和冒号 (:) 是文字符号。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 下表介绍了剩余的元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
Description
An optional negative sign, which indicates a negative time interval.
trans-unit.target: 可选负号，指示负时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The optional number of days, with no leading zeros.
trans-unit.target: 不带前导零的可选天数。

trans-unit.source: *hh*
The number of hours, which ranges from "00" to "23".
*mm*
The number of minutes, which ranges from "00" to "59".
*ss*
The number of seconds, which ranges from "0" to "59".
*fffffff*
The optional fractional portion of a second.
Its value can range from "0000001" (one tick, or one ten-millionth of a second) to "9999999" (9,999,999 ten-millionths of a second, or one second less one tick).
trans-unit.target: 其值的范围为“0000001”（一刻度或一秒的千万分之一）到“9999999”（一秒的千万分之九百九十九万九千九百九十九或一秒少一刻度）。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the "g" and "G" format specifiers, the "c" format specifier is not culture-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 与“g”和“G”格式说明符不同，“c”格式说明符不区分区域性。

trans-unit.source: It produces the string representation of a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value that is invariant and that is common to all previous versions of the .NET Framework before the .NET Framework 4.
trans-unit.target: 它生成 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值的字符串表示形式，该值不变且对 .NET Framework 4 之前的所有 .NET Framework 先前版本均通用。

trans-unit.source: "c" is the default [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format string; the [TimeSpan.ToString](xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString) method formats a time interval value by using the "c" format string.
trans-unit.target: “c”是默认的 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式字符串；[TimeSpan.ToString](xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString) 方法通过使用“c”格式字符串设置时间间隔值的格式。

trans-unit.source: [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) also supports the "t" and "T" standard format strings, which are identical in behavior to the "c" standard format string.
trans-unit.target: [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 也支持“t”和“T”标准格式字符串，其行为与“c”标准格式字符串相同。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates two [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) objects, uses them to perform arithmetic operations, and displays the result.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例对两个 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 对象进行了实例化，使用它们来执行算术运算并显示结果。

trans-unit.source: In each case, it uses composite formatting to display the [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value by using the "c" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 在每种情况下，它都通过“c”格式说明符使用复合格式设置来显示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值。

trans-unit.source: The General Short ("g") Format Specifier

The "g" [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format specifier returns the string representation of a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value in a compact form by including only the elements that are necessary.
trans-unit.target: “g”[TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式说明符通过只包含所需元素来返回压缩形式的 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: It has the following form:
Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The colon (:) is a literal symbol.
trans-unit.target: 冒号 (:) 是一种文字符号。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 下表介绍了剩余的元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
Description
An optional negative sign, which indicates a negative time interval.
trans-unit.target: 可选负号，指示负时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The optional number of days, with no leading zeros.
trans-unit.target: 不带前导零的可选天数。

trans-unit.source: *hh*
The number of hours, which ranges from "0" to "23", with no leading zeros.
trans-unit.target: 范围为“0”到“23”的小时数，无前导零。

trans-unit.source: *mm*
The number of minutes, which ranges from "00" to "59".
*ss*
The number of seconds, which ranges from "0" to "59".
The fractional seconds separator.
trans-unit.target: 秒的小数部分的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: *FFFFFFF*
The fractional seconds.
As few digits as possible are displayed.
Like the "G" format specifier, the "g" format specifier is localized.
trans-unit.target: 和“G”格式一样，对“g”格式说明符进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Its fractional seconds separator is based on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 其小数秒分隔符基于当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates two [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) objects, uses them to perform arithmetic operations, and displays the result.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例对两个 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 对象进行了实例化，使用它们来执行算术运算并显示结果。

trans-unit.source: In each case, it uses composite formatting to display the [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value by using the "g" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 在每种情况下，它都通过“g”格式说明符使用复合格式设置来显示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值。

trans-unit.source: In addition, it formats the [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value by using the formatting conventions of the current system culture (which, in this case, is English - United States or en-US) and the French - France (fr-FR) culture.
trans-unit.target: 此外，通过使用当前系统区域（在此情况下为“英语 - 美国”或“en-US”）和“法语 - 法国 (fr-FR)”区域的格式化约定来设置 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值的格式。

trans-unit.source: The General Long ("G") Format Specifier

The "G" [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format specifier returns the string representation of a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value in a long form that always includes both days and fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: “G”[TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式说明符采用始终包含天数和小数秒的长格式返回 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The string that results from the "G" standard format specifier has the following form:
trans-unit.target: “G”标准格式说明符生成的字符串具有以下形式：

trans-unit.source: [-]*d*:*hh*:*mm*:*ss*.*fffffff*
Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The colon (:) is a literal symbol.
trans-unit.target: 冒号 (:) 是一种文字符号。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 下表介绍了剩余的元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
Description
An optional negative sign, which indicates a negative time interval.
trans-unit.target: 可选负号，指示负时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The optional number of days, with no leading zeros.
trans-unit.target: 不带前导零的可选天数。

trans-unit.source: *hh*
The number of hours, which ranges from "0" to "23".
*mm*
The number of minutes, which ranges from "00" to "59".
*ss*
The number of seconds, which ranges from "0" to "59".
The fractional seconds separator.
trans-unit.target: 秒的小数部分的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: *fffffff*
The fractional seconds.
Like the "G" format specifier, the "g" format specifier is localized.
trans-unit.target: 和“G”格式一样，对“g”格式说明符进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Its fractional seconds separator is based on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 其小数秒分隔符基于当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates two [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) objects, uses them to perform arithmetic operations, and displays the result.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例对两个 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 对象进行了实例化，使用它们来执行算术运算并显示结果。

trans-unit.source: In each case, it uses composite formatting to display the [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value by using the "G" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 在每种情况下，它都通过“G”格式说明符使用复合格式设置来显示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值。

trans-unit.source: In addition, it formats the [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value by using the formatting conventions of the current system culture (which, in this case, is English - United States or en-US) and the French - France (fr-FR) culture.
trans-unit.target: 此外，通过使用当前系统区域（在此情况下为“英语 - 美国”或“en-US”）和“法语 - 法国 (fr-FR)”区域的格式化约定来设置 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值的格式。

trans-unit.source: See Also
[Formatting types](formatting-types.md)
[Composite formatting](composite-format.md)
[Parsing strings](parsing-strings.md)
